00032 // Specialize DDS for returned data. This currently means adding version
00033 // information about the source of the data. Was it from a version 1, 2 or
00034 // later server?
00035 // 
00036 // jhrg 9/19/97
00037 
00038 #ifndef _datadds_h
00039 #define _datadds_h 1
00040 
00041 #ifndef __POWERPC__
00042 #ifdef __GNUG__
00043 #pragma interface
00044 #endif
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #include <iostream>
00048 #include <string>
00049 
00050 #ifndef _dds_h
00051 #include "DDS.h"
00052 #endif
00053 
00062 class DataDDS : public DDS {
00063 private:
00064     string _server_version;
00065     int _server_version_major;
00066     int _server_version_minor;
00067 
00068     void _version_string_to_numbers();
00069 
00070 public:
00071     DataDDS(const string &n = "", const string &v = "");
00072     virtual ~DataDDS();
00073 
00074     void set_version(const string &v);
00075     string get_version();
00076 
00077     int get_version_major();
00078     int get_version_minor();
00079 
00080     int sequence_level();
00081     
00082     void set_sequence_level(int level);
00083 };

00085 // Revision 1.8.4.1  2002/09/05 22:52:54  pwest
00086 // Replaced the GNU data structures SLList and DLList with the STL container
00087 // class vector<>. To maintain use of Pix, changed the Pix.h header file to
00088 // redefine Pix to be an IteratorAdapter. Usage remains the same and all code
00089 // outside of the DAP should compile and link with no problems. Added methods
00090 // to the different classes where Pix is used to include methods to use STL
00091 // iterators. Replaced the use of Pix within the DAP to use iterators instead.
00092 // Updated comments for documentation, updated the test suites, and added some
00093 // unit tests. Updated the Makefile to remove GNU/SLList and GNU/DLList.
